metadata.title: Stable Isotope Ratio in Biota

creators.name: University of Alaska Fairbanks (UAF), School of Fisheries
Ocean Sciences (SFOS), Institute of Marine Science (IMS)

metadata.description: The data set comprises carbon and nitrogen isotope ratios in organisms ranging from phytoplankton to polar bears. Samples come from the Gulf of Alaska, Bering Sea, Chukchi Sea, Beaufort Sea and Arctic Ocean.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Data sets are for food web interpretation, determining effects of climate change and for hindcasting primary productivity.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Monthly

Access constraints: Some data still in publication process

Use constraints: None
